content: The situation we find ourselves in is based on expected level of CapEx next year in China, which I mentioned was around 3.5 billion, and out of which we expect to debt finance 60%, which is just over 2 billion. Hey, Gokul, we can't hear you. Hey, Gokul, we can't hear you. You've mentioned revenue and EBITDA, I think the international business will be mildly EBITDA negative next year, be around breakeven the year after, it could be better, but that's the base case.
